org.kkevin.xmlmanipulator
Class XMLDatabaseTable

java.lang.Object
  org.kkevin.xmlmanipulator.XMLDatabaseTable

public final class XMLDatabaseTable
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides the functionality to create updater compatible XML Tables easily.

finalizeDocument

public void finalizeDocument()
finalize document, add hashes to rows and the table head this makes it easy to detect changes among the rows and makes it easy to update data where necessary. not stable yet!
